drupalNodeEvent.title: China Now Music Festival: China and Beethoven, "贝多芬在中国 (Beethoven in China)"

field_speakers.processed: Jindong Cai (US-China Music Institute at Bard College), Yong Ho (China Institute)

field_organizers.processed: US-China Music Institute of the Bard College Conservatory of Music, China Institute's Renwen Society

field_description.processed: China Institute’s Renwen Society hosts Jindong Cai in a webinar discussion in Chinese of his book 'Beethoven in China: How the Great Composer Became an Icon in the People’s Republic.'
